content:
Room admins can create and manage the assigned rooms, invite new users and assign roles below their level. All admins have access to the {{sectionName}} section.
<1>In {{agentSection}}: can create and manage {{agentSection}}, including their knowledge base and access settings.

comment.text: This text describes the permissions and responsibilities of a Room Admin user role. It explains their ability to manage rooms, users, roles, and access settings within the application, specifically including details about managing agents and their associated knowledge base. This description appears within UI elements related to user roles and access controls.
